text: I can imagine few things more trying to the patience than the long wasted days of waiting.
author: Robert Falcon Scott

text: If I could have one prayer answered, I would pray for patience. I move so fast sometimes. I try to slow down.
author: Debra Winger

text: A final word: I am not knowledgeable about the internet. I do not have a computer. I guess that at 74 years of age, I don't have the patience to learn.
author: David Wilkerson

text: It's a war of attrition. If you have patience and a modicum of faith in yourself your chances are not too bad.
author: Julie Bowen
